item.title: 辛杜贾贩卖人口案定于 6 月开庭审理，家属的论点被驳回
item.description: 亿万富翁欣杜贾家族的四名成员因虐待其家庭佣工而被控贩卖人口，法官驳回了他们的律师关于瑞士对他们的起诉书存在缺陷的论点，对他们的审判将于 6 月进行。【原文：The trial of four members of the billionaire Hinduja family charged with human trafficking over the mistreatment of their domestic staff will proceed in June after judges rejected arguments from their lawyers that the the Swiss indictment against them was flawed.】

item.title: 主要港口受干扰影响，俄罗斯原油流量回落
item.description:
波罗的海和太平洋最大出口码头的装运量下降 

Shipments drop from the largest Baltic and Pacific export terminals 

】

item.title: 联合利华被指将考虑在中国出售净水业务 Truliva
item.description: 据知情人士透露，联合利华集团正在考虑出售其在沁园集团股份有限公司（Qinyuan Group Co.【原文：Unilever Plc is considering selling its majority stake in Qinyuan Group Co., a Chinese maker of water purification equipment that it acquired for an undisclosed sum in 2014, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 德国出生率骤降，战争、气候和 Covid 使父母望而却步
item.description: 去年，德国的出生率降至十多年来的最低水平，这加剧了人们对劳动力萎缩可能影响国家经济前景的担忧。【原文：Germany’s birth rate fell to the lowest level in more than a decade last year, adding to concerns about how a shrinking workforce may dent the country’s economic prospects.】

item.title: 数据更新后中国 2 月青年失业率上升
item.description: 中国的青年失业率在 2 月份有所上升，因为这个世界第二大经济体的应届毕业生就业市场仍然面临压力。【原文：China’s youth unemployment rate ticked up in February as the jobs market for recent graduates remains under pressure in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行不能承诺在可能的 6 月行动之后再进行削减
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲央行在 6 月份可能采取首次行动后，无法承诺进一步降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank can’t commit to further reductions in borrowing costs after a likely first move in June, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 贝莱德被德州基金抛弃显示芬克劝说的局限性
item.description: 几周前，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）与得克萨斯州副州长丹-帕特里克（Dan Patrick）在休斯顿的一次行业活动中登台亮相。【原文：It was just weeks ago when BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink took the stage with Texas Lieutenant Governor Dan Patrick at an industry event in Houston.】

item.title: 欧盟提出将俄罗斯冷冻现金利润用于乌克兰的计划
item.description: 欧盟最高外交官周三提出了一项计划，利用被制裁的俄罗斯中央银行资产收益来帮助满足乌克兰的军事需求。【原文：The European Union’s top diplomat offered a plan Wednesday to use proceeds from sanctioned Russian central bank assets to help fund Ukraine’s military needs.】

item.title: 冰岛将西欧最高利率保持在 9.25% 不变
item.description: 冰岛中央银行将利率维持在 14 年来的最高水平，以继续抑制通货膨胀，因为物价上涨已被证明是有韧性的。【原文：Iceland’s central bank held interest rates at a 14-year high to continue taming inflation as price gains prove resilient.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉（Mubadala）与太平洋投资基金（PIF）一道转向伊斯兰债务市场筹集资金
item.description: 阿布扎比穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Mubadala Investment Co. is seeking to raise about $1 billion in its first dollar-denominated Islamic bond sale as the the Abu Dhabi fund seeks to take advantage of increased investor demand for the debt.】

item.title: 奢侈品价值缩水 300 亿美元，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 开云集团（Kering SA）警告称，古驰（Gucci）的销售额急剧下降，奢侈品股暴跌，市值缩水 300 多亿美元，欧洲股市受此拖累下跌。【原文：European stocks fell, weighed down by a slump for luxury shares that wiped more than $30 billion off their market value, after Kering SA warned that sales at Gucci have plunged.】

item.title: Kering 发出古驰销售暴跌警告后股价下跌
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering SA）警告称，其最大品牌古驰（Gucci）第一季度的销售额下降了约 20%，随后该集团股价暴跌。【原文：Kering SA shares tumbled after the French luxury group warned that sales at Gucci, its biggest brand, have fallen about 20% in the first quarter.】

item.title: 中国将通过公开拍卖出售特别超长期债券
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，中国计划主要通过银行间市场公开拍卖而非定向销售的方式发行超长期限主权特别债券。【原文：China plans to issue its special ultra-long sovereign notes mainly through public auctions in the interbank market rather than through targeted sales, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 台湾掉期价格今年升息的可能性较高
item.description: 由于电力价格的潜在上涨推高了岛内的通胀预期，台湾投资者正准备在未来一年采取更紧缩的货币政策。【原文：Taiwanese investors are bracing for a tighter monetary policy over the coming year as a potential increase in power prices pushes up inflation expectations on the island.】

item.title: 德国高管称欧盟正在失去经济竞争力
item.description: 德国工业游说组织 DIHK 的一项最新调查显示，大多数德国企业高管认为欧盟已经失去了作为经商之地的吸引力。【原文：A majority of German executives think the European Union has lost attractiveness as a place for doing business, according to a new survey by the DIHK industry lobby.】

item.title: Sustainalytics 指出，欧洲投资银行可为国防提供资金，并保持最高的 ESG 分数
莫奈克斯称日本有更多 "火力 "抵御日元下滑
item.description: Monex Europe Ltd.的外汇分析主管西蒙-哈维（Simon Harvey）认为，日本的货币政策转向使其拥有了更多的 "火力 "来捍卫不断下滑的日元。【原文：Japan’s monetary policy pivot has given it more “firepower” to defend the slumping yen, according to Simon Harvey, head of FX analysis at Monex Europe Ltd.】

item.title: 印尼延长利率暂停期以在美联储决议前支撑印尼盾
item.description: 印尼央行一如预期维持借贷成本不变，政策制定者仍将重点放在保护印尼盾免受美国利率前景带来的影响。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank left borrowing costs unchanged as expected, with policymakers staying focused on shielding the rupiah from vulnerabilities emanating from the US rate outlook.】

item.title: 印度航空首席执行官表示，印度航空业的蓬勃发展可支持更多枢纽的建立
item.description: 印度航空有限公司首席执行官坎贝尔-威尔逊（Campbell Wilson）说，印度航空业发展迅速，除孟买和德里外，印度至少还能支持另一个国际枢纽。【原文：India’s airline industry is growing so fast that the country could support at least one other international hub beyond Mumbai and Delhi, Campbell Wilson, the chief executive officer of Air India Ltd., said.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
item.description: 伦敦白教堂市场上的果蔬摊。摄影师：Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg【原文：A fruit and vegetable stall on Whitechapel market in London. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 中国央行任命两位学者为新政策顾问
item.description: 中国央行已任命两位著名经济学家为货币政策委员会成员，该委员会负责就政策决策提供建议。【原文：China’s central bank has named two prominent economists as members of its monetary policy committee, which advises on policy decisions.】

item.title: K-pop 明星将与大谷一起参加 MLB 首尔运动会，展示韩国风采
item.description: 大谷翔平不会是本周三在首尔高尺巨蛋（Gocheok Sky Dome）的唯一贵宾，K-pop 偶像、知名运动员和政府官员都将在美国职业棒球大联盟新赛季揭幕战上向世界展示韩国。【原文：Shohei Ohtani won’t be the only VIP present at Seoul’s Gocheok Sky Dome on Wednesday as K-pop idols, celebrity athletes and government officials join the opportunity to showcase South Korea to the world at the Major League Baseball season opener.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 欧洲央行计划向投资者介绍关键工资指标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行正计划例行公布官员们在考虑何时降息时用来衡量通胀风险的内部薪酬标准。【原文：The European Central Bank is planning to routinely publish internal pay measures being used by officials to gauge inflation risks as they consider when to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 泰国考虑禁止从邻国进口玉米应对雾霾
item.description: 泰国正在权衡一项禁令，禁止从实行农业焚烧的邻国进口玉米，因为这个东南亚国家正在加紧努力，与长期空气污染作斗争，这种污染已对泰国一些热门旅游景点造成了冲击。【原文：Thailand is weighing a ban on imports of corn from neighboring countries that practice agricultural burning, as the Southeast Asian nation steps up efforts to battle a chronic air pollution that’s hit some of its popular tourist spots.】

item.title: 印度最大的电池千兆工厂将于十月投产
item.description: 印度最大的千兆电池工厂将于 10 月份开始运营，据其所有者、电池制造商 Good Enough Energy 称，该工厂计划到 2026 年将产能提高近三倍。【原文：India’s largest gigafactory for batteries will start operating in October, and plans to almost triple its capacity by 2026, according to its owner, battery-maker Good Enough Energy.】

item.title: 中央银行行长称，加入欧盟的漫长等待意味着北马其顿投资者的减少
item.description: 北马其顿央行行长表示，加入欧盟的谈判缺乏进展正在驱赶投资者。【原文：North Macedonia’s central bank governor said the lack of progress in talks to join the European Union is driving away investors.】

item.title: 美联储 "春之祭 "绽放通胀担忧之花
item.description:
经济过热现在被视为比经济衰退更大的风险，这是对降息的又一次打击。【原文：

Overheating in the economy is now seen as a bigger risk than recession in yet one more strike against rate cuts. 

】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛重启业务，摆脱瑞士银行业新困境
item.description:
在经历了一系列失误之后，这家私人银行的管理层承诺控制风险。【原文：

After a series of missteps, the private bank’s management is pledging to rein in risk.

】

item.title: 如果你是人工智能牛人，请关注铀矿
item.description:
未来取决于我们是否有能力生产更多的电力。【原文：

The future depends on our ability to generate a lot more electricity.

】
